title: Phantom Dancer

embed.description: Uhm quick question does anyone know why Phantom Dancer is disabled? I can't find anything on it.

body:
Phantom Dancer is currently disabled on patch 5.22.

It was apparently also disabled on the PBE...

replies.body: Why does no one ever say what the bug is? If the item is disabled, people get curious as to the circumstances.
Phantom Dancer is currently disabled due to a bug - we're currently working on fixing the issue so the item can be renabled.
Would have been nice if there is a notification somewhere before i go into game with a specific build idea that requires phantom... such as yi or vayne
Lol there is, look at the top left of your client next time. There's an alert that pops up telling you which item or champ has been disabled. "View game status" button
No there wasnt at the time i have been playing for 4 years now... i know where it is.

Could you please tell us what the bug is exactly? I always find these little game changing bugs very interesting, and funny. I'm sure i'm not the only person who gets a {{champion:64}} kick out of these Rito.

Lol and go ahead and  disable Vayne, too. 

No PD, no Vayne
Shiv works just as well, just a little less DPS. One item doesn't break champs entirely.
